name: TheDigitalAssistantAcademyFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Digital Assistant Academy provides a comprehensive focus on learner and industry needs. This gives it a clear advantage over voice tech course providers. Established in 2020, the Academy is the only organization with strong connections to the voice tech industry across the globe. This enables the Academy to set the standards and frameworks for privacy, ethics, inclusivity, and conversation design. The academy provides Voice Interaction Design certification for our students.

This flash briefing is a weekly update on the latest news from the Digital Assistant Academy, and the world of voice design research. 

To find out more, please visit: www.digitalassistant.academy
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
